content: starts with a double_crochet have a look at a video i made for another carpet and learn to make false double_crochet s https //www youtube com/watch v=v0a9p8auiv4 the same trick can be used when the round starts with bpdc or fpdc all instructions for making this carpet have been first published in polish on my blog in three parts as a christmas cal part 1 rounds 1-26 http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2021/12/szydekowe-odliczanie-do-zimy-czesc-i html part 2 rounds 27-39 http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2021/12/szydekowe-odliczanie-do-zimy-czesc-ii html part 3 rounds 40-47 http //magiccarpetstudio blogspot com/2021/12/szydekowe-odliczanie-do-zimy-czesc-iii html i will use the us crochet notation throughout this tutorial chain chain double_crochet double_crochet slip_stitch slip_stitch fpdc front post double_crochet bpdc back post double_crochet single_crochet single_crochet fpsc front post single_crochet tc treble_crochet bpsc back post single_crochet bptc back post treble_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet puff don t worry i ll give you a fphdc front post half_double_crochet link to the video bphdc back post half_double_crochet round #1 make 24 tc into the magic loop the first tc may be „pretended by 4 chain do not close the round with a slip_stitch instead take out the hook insert the hook from back to front into the 4th chain of the „pretended tc and pull up a loop we close the round in such a strange way because the next round will use back post stitches and it will just look better this way magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #2 repeat 24 times 1 bpdc 1 chain close the round with a slip_stitch remember that you can make a false bpdc at the beginning of this round round #3 make 1 chain to start the round from appropriate height and then repeat 24 times 1 puff around the bpdc 1 single_crochet in the 1ch-space close the round with a slip stitch we have 48 stitches all around a half of them are puff stitches and the other half are single_crochet s you can find the puff stitch video here https //www youtube com/watch v=g_tg-ffdo98 round #4 repeat 48 times 1 double_crochet 1 chain close the round with a slip_stitch round #5 it s basically the same as round #3 make 1 chain to start the round from appropriate height and then repeat 48 times 1 puff around the double_crochet 1 single_crochet in the 1ch-space close the round with a slip_stitch we have 96 stitches all around a half of them are puff stitches and the other half are single_crochet s your work may wobble but don t worry it will even itself out in the coming rounds but only if you sit on it while crocheting round #6 make 96 half_double_crochet all around do not close the round with a slip_stitch instead take out the hook insert the hook from back to front into the top of the first half_double_crochet and pull up a loop we had a similar ending in round #1 magic carpet studio www facebook com/magiccarpetstudio/ www magiccarpetstudio blogspot com round #7 make 96 bpdc
